      • setCrawlStorageFolder

        public void setCrawlStorageFolder(java.lang.String crawlStorageFolder)
        The folder which will be used by crawler for storing the intermediate crawl data. The content of this folder should not be modified manually.
        Parameters:
        crawlStorageFolder - The folder for the crawler's storage

        See Also:

      • setMaxDepthOfCrawling

        public void setMaxDepthOfCrawling(int maxDepthOfCrawling)
        Maximum depth of crawling For unlimited depth this parameter should be set to -1
        Parameters:
        maxDepthOfCrawling - Depth of crawling (all links on current page = depth of 1)

      • setMaxDownloadSize

        public void setMaxDownloadSize(int maxDownloadSize)
        Parameters:
        maxDownloadSize - Max allowed size of a page. Pages larger than this size will not be fetched.

      • setMaxOutgoingLinksToFollow

        public void setMaxOutgoingLinksToFollow(int maxOutgoingLinksToFollow)
        Set the number of outgoing links to follow from each page. Default is -1 (unlimited).
        Parameters:
        maxOutgoingLinksToFollow - Max number of outgoing links which are processed from a page

      • setMaxPagesToFetch

        public void setMaxPagesToFetch(int maxPagesToFetch)
        Maximum number of pages to fetch For unlimited number of pages, this parameter should be set to -1
        Parameters:
        maxPagesToFetch - How many pages to fetch from all threads together ?

      • setMaxTotalConnections

        public void setMaxTotalConnections(int maxTotalConnections)
        Parameters:
        maxTotalConnections - Maximum total connections

      • setOnlineTldListUpdate

        public void setOnlineTldListUpdate(boolean online)
        Should the TLD list be updated automatically on each run? Alternatively, it can be loaded from the embedded tld-names.txt resource file that was obtained from https://publicsuffix.org/list/effective_tld_names.dat

      • setPolitenessDelay

        public void setPolitenessDelay(int politenessDelay)
        Politeness delay in milliseconds (delay between sending two requests to the same host).
        Parameters:
        politenessDelay - the delay in milliseconds.

      • setProcessBinaryContentInCrawling

        public void setProcessBinaryContentInCrawling(boolean processBinaryContentInCrawling)
        Should we process binary content such as images, audio, ... using TIKA?

      • setProxyHost

        public void setProxyHost(java.lang.String proxyHost)
        Parameters:
        proxyHost - If crawler should run behind a proxy, this parameter can be used for specifying the proxy host.

      • setProxyPassword

        public void setProxyPassword(java.lang.String proxyPassword)
        If crawler should run behind a proxy and user/pass is needed for authentication in proxy, this parameter can be used for specifying the password.
        Parameters:
        proxyPassword - String Password

      • setProxyPort

        public void setProxyPort(int proxyPort)
        Parameters:
        proxyPort - If crawler should run behind a proxy, this parameter can be used for specifying the proxy port.

      • setProxyUsername

        public void setProxyUsername(java.lang.String proxyUsername)
        Parameters:
        proxyUsername - If crawler should run behind a proxy and user/pass is needed for authentication in proxy, this parameter can be used for specifying the username.

      • setResumableCrawling

        public void setResumableCrawling(boolean resumableCrawling)
        If this feature is enabled, you would be able to resume a previously stopped/crashed crawl. However, it makes crawling slightly slower
        Parameters:
        resumableCrawling - Should crawling be resumable between runs ?

      • setShutdownOnEmptyQueue

        public void setShutdownOnEmptyQueue(boolean shutdown)
        Should the crawler stop running when the queue is empty?

        user-agent string that is used for representing your crawler to web servers. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User_agent for more details
        Parameters:
        userAgentString - Custom userAgent string to use as your crawler's identifier
